DataElement.preferredName: Adverse Event Other Therapy Short Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Abbreviated text field to describe treatment of type 'Other' to treat or manage an adverse event.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Treatment of type 'Other' to treat or manage an adverse event.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An unwanted effect caused by a drug or therapy.  Such effects can be drug related, dose related, route related, patient related, caused by an interaction with another drug, or caused by opioid initiation or dose escalation.

Concepts.definition: Any unfavorable or unintended disease, sign, or symptom (including an abnormal laboratory finding) that is temporally associated with the use of a medical treatment or procedure, and that may or may not be considered related to the medical treatment or procedure. Such events can be related to the intervention, dose, route of administration, patient, or caused by an interaction with another drug(s) or procedure(s).

ObjectClass.changeDescription: Change concept code to C41331 as C2861 is retired per EVS. dw

Property.preferredDefinition: Not otherwise specified.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition:
any unfavorable symptoms, signs, or disease temporally associated with the use of a medical
treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical
treatment or procedure.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created to support Duke Adverse Event CRF.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Abbreviated text field of information related to an adverse event assessment.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Having little (physical) length or seeming to be limited in (temporal) duration.:Text; the words of something written.
